## cilium bpf egress get

Get egress policy entry

### Synopsis

Get egress policy entries using source and destination IPs.


```
cilium bpf egress get [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for get
```

      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
